task.title: Set up a management node
task.shortdesc: You can install the NetApp Element software management node (mNode) to upgrade and provide system services, manage cluster assets and settings, run system tests and utilities, and enable NetApp Support access for troubleshooting.

step.cmd: See the install the management node documentation.

info.note: To set up Active IQ, use the --telemetry_active parameter in the setup script to enable data collection for analytics by Active IQ.
